arts.ttl: Goalkeeper Rönnow the hero for Union Berlin as it claims unlikely 2-1 win at Eintracht Frankfurt
arts.sum: Hugo Ekitiké had the chance to equalize from the spot in the fifth minute of stoppage time after Union defender Diogo Leite was penalized for hand ball through a VAR check. Hollerbach thought he’d scored the third in the 87th, but that goal was ruled out after a VAR check for a hand-ball by Schäfer.

arts.ttl: Super sub Wooyeong Jeong completes dramatic Union Berlin comeback to stun Eintracht Frankfurt
arts.sum: Union Berlin come from behind to beat Eintracht Frankfurt 2-1 in a Bundesliga thriller, with Wooyeong Jeong scoring the winner for the Irons and Frederik Rønnow the hero after saving a late penalty. The Deutsche Bank Park played host to a Bundesliga classic as Union Berlin staged a remarkable comeback to defeat Eintracht Frankfurt 2-1.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin Break Eintracht Frankfurt Hearts with Dramatic Win
arts.sum: Union Berlin boosted their Bundesliga survival hopes with just their third away win of the season as they defeated Eintracht Frankfurt 2-1. Jeong Woo-Yeong’s late winner proved the difference for…

arts.ttl: Union Berlin loanee Král expected to sign permanently for Espanyol
arts.sum: A fee in the low single digit millions would be enough for Union Berlin to sell.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Union Berlin
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Union Berlin.

arts.ttl: Baribo, Union off to historic starts after 2-0 win over still-scoreless Revolution
arts.sum: Tai Baribo scored his sixth goal of the season and Jovan Lukic scored his first career MLS goal on Saturday night to help the Philadelphia Union beat the New England Revolution 2-0. Lukic, a 23-year-old Serbian midfielder acquired in February, ran onto a ball played backward by Indiana Vassilev and blasted a one-touch shot from the edge of the area that bounced off the back post into the net in the seventh minutes of stoppage time to make it 2-0.
